definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: Hu and Roh Moo-hyun also jointly met with journalists from the Chinese and ROK media.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤和盧武鉉還共同會見了中韓媒體記者。

sentences.english: What is your expectation of China-ROK relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula in the coming year?
sentences.chinese: 中方對中韓關係和朝鮮半島局勢有何期待？

sentences.english: Foreign Ministries of China and the ROK have recently held the 3rd High-level Strategic Dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 中韓兩國外交部門近日舉行了第三次高級別戰略對話。

sentences.english: China and Korea have a long history of calligraphy art.
sentences.chinese: 中韓兩國均有着悠久的書法藝術發展歷史。

sentences.english: The contemporary literature of China and Korea is developing on the each other' s parallel track.
sentences.chinese: 中韓兩國當代文學是沿着各自的軌跡平行發展着的。

sentences.english: He is satisfied with the development of China-South Korea relations.
sentences.chinese: 我對中韓關係發展感到滿意。

sentences.english: Entrepreneurs and companies are a dynamic force in China-ROK business cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 企業家和企業是中韓經貿合作的生力軍。

sentences.english: Rizhao Rewon is a China-Korea joint venture company manufacturing nail collating machines.
sentences.chinese: 日照利源是一家生產製釘機械的中韓合資企業。

sentences.english: Now the Foreign Ministries of the two countries are having consultations on that.
sentences.chinese: 中韓兩國的外交部門正在就此進行溝通和協商。

sentences.english: This sixth grader is Chinese-Korean and remembers Ward's visit.
sentences.chinese: 這個小女孩上六年級，是中韓混血兒。

sentences.english: Hu pointed out that currently bilateral relations have maintained sound development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤指出，當前中韓關係保持着良好發展勢頭。

sentences.english: Hu said currently China-ROK relations have maintained a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤表示，當前，中韓關係發展勢頭良好。

definition: abbr. for 國際關係學院|国际关系学院[Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4], University of International Relations, Beijing
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
